description: Query a list of domain applications.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: If set to 1: verbose output (more parameters)
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes

Parameter by which the output will be sorted.Must be one of the following:CLASS, CLASSDESC, DOMAIN, DOMAINDESC, USER, USERDESC, CREATEDDATE, CREATEDDATEDESC, UPDATEDDATE, UPDATEDDATEDESC, REGISTRATIONEXPIRATIONDATE, REGISTRATIONEXPIRATIONDATEDESC, REGISTRAR, REGISTRARDESC
Depth of the list, may be: SELF, SUBUSER or ALL. Default is ALL
Search for: Class (see domain feature management commands)
Search for several classes at once
Search for several domains at once
Only list applications for domains which match the regular expression stated here, e.g. ^te.*\.com would match only .com domains that start with "te"
Search for: Owner/Registrant Contact Handle ID
